Just finish the game. Took me 10 hour I think to finish this game. Great story, gameplay and the ending song sound nice. Some of the puzzle a bit stress to solve but it fun. Portal 1 and 2 were my first puzzle game solve without guide. Portal 1 a bit easy but on Portal 2 some of the puzzle were harder and longer than portal 1. It require you to use your brain.

This game is pretty good... 
i like how it still improved upon the gameplay of the first game while still being its own thing...
graphics are also improved alot from the first game which means they likely mastered the engine at this point...
multiplayer and the workshop are a pretty big plus since you can now play as many test chambers as your hearts content...
or you can be me and try to find new ways to kill your friends in coop...
A wonderful game to enjoy, especially if you like puzzles. Even if you don't the plot is great. Portal 2 is an amazing sequel to Portal, and is still good on its own.

This was a really fun game. One of my assignments in a class I was taking was to play a game I hadn't played before and review it, so I figured, "Hey, I bought Portal and Portal 2 a few months ago, I should try it out."

I needed to play for 3 hours. I played for 6. From the start, the storyline hooked me, and the gameplay was just as fun and challenging as it was in Portal. It was a great continuation, and while I still need to finish it, I've really enjoyed it. My assignment was back in April, and the only reason I haven't jumped back in to finish the game is because I know I won't be able to stop until it's done. This is one game series that does live up to the hype.
Great game, humour is on point and the co-op is very replayable. The story is great too
very good. Long story with a few twists. DO recommend.
